Interface DAO<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity managed by this DAO
All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthorDAO, CommentDAO, GenreDAO, MusicalInstrumentDAO, PendingUserDAO, ResourceDAO, TrackAuthorDAO, TrackDAO, TrackGenreDAO, TrackInstrumentDAO, UserDAO
public interface DAO<T>
Generic Data Access Object (DAO) interface defining standard CRUD operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteById(int id)
    Deletes an entity record identified by the given ID.
    List<T>
    getAll()
    Retrieves all entity records stored in the data source.
    T
    getById(int id)
    Retrieves an entity record by its unique identifier.
    Integer
    insert(T data)
    Inserts a new entity record into the data source.
    void
    updateById(T data, int id)
    Updates an existing entity record identified by the given ID.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      Integer insert(T data)
      Inserts a new entity record into the data source.
      Parameters:
      data - the entity to be inserted
      Returns:
      the generated ID of the inserted entity, or null if insertion failed

    • updateById

      void updateById(T data, int id)
      Updates an existing entity record identified by the given ID.
      Parameters:
      data - the updated entity data
      id - the ID of the entity to update

    • deleteById

      void deleteById(int id)
      Deletes an entity record identified by the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity to delete

    • getById

      T getById(int id)
      Retrieves an entity record by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity to retrieve
      Returns:
      the entity if found, or null if no matching record exists

    • getAll

      List<T> getAll()
      Retrieves all entity records stored in the data source.
      Returns:
      a sorted list of all entities
